vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for a Planned Development District for MU-1 Mixed Use District uses; and termination of deed restrictions [Z990-137] on property zoned an MU-1 Mixed Use District and CR Community Retail District, at the southeast corner of Gaston Avenue, Garland Road, and East Grand Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a development plan and staff’s recommended conditions; and approval of the termination of the deed restrictions [Z990-137]
Recommendation of CPC:  Denial without prejudice
Z201-139(NN)
